pgn: 1. e4 d6 2. d4 Nf6 3. Nc3 g6 4. Nf3 {This move develops a piece and prepares to castle.}
1. e4 d6 2. d4 Nf6 3. Nc3 g6 4. Be2 {This move develops a piece and helps to control the center of the board.}
1. e4 d6 2. d4 Nf6 3. Nc3 g6 4. g3 {This move develops a knight and supports the pawn on e4.}
1. e4 d6 2. d4 Nf6 3. Nc3 g6 4. Bg5 {This move attacks Black's pawn on d6 and prepares to castle.}
1. e4 d6 2. d4 Nf6 3. Nc3 g6 4. d5 {This move tries to gain space in the center of the board and put pressure on Black's pawn on d6.}
1. e4 d6 2. d4 Nf6 3. Nc3 g6 4. Qe2 {This move develops a piece and prepares to castle, while also supporting the pawn on e4.}
